item.title: Fidelity, Nomura Line Up Bids for Ola Electric’s IPO, Reuters Says
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- SoftBank Group Corp.-backed Indian e-scooter maker Ola Electric Mobility Ltd.’s initial public offering is set to draw investor bids from Fidelity, Nomura and Norway’s Norges Bank, Reuters reports, citing two people with direct knowledge of the matter. Fidelity is expected to place bi...
